title: Refinance - Transcope
html: Refinance
description: Find the savviest way to refinance.                  Increase savings                  Extinguish high interest debt                  Leverage your equity             Remaining Balance               Zip Code                          View Rates                    DEBT CONSOLIDATION   Put your mortgage to work.                                  High Interest Credit Cards   Credit cards typically have a much higher interest rate than a mortgage. Consolidating this debt with a cash out mortgage may lower your payment substantially.                   Student Loans   In some cases makes sense to pay off your student loans using a mortgage. Talk to one of our experts to learn more.                   Other Types of Debt Consolidation   Tax liens, title liens, auto loans and solar are other types of debt that may have a higher interest rate and could benefit from being consolidated into a mortgage.                      Consolidate My Debt             HOME IMPROVEMENT   It's your home. Improve it.   Meaningful RenovationsCertain renovations have a larger impact on your home's value. Invest in your home and your happiness.   Get More for Your MoneyOur low-cost loan options leave you with more money to invest in your home.   How Much Can I Take Out?You may be able to get a loan for up to 80% of your home's value. Veterans typically qualify for more.                      Improve My Home             RATE & TERM   Other ways to Refinance                   Lower Your Rate   Why pay more when you can pay less? A lower interest could save you thousands.                      Lower My Rate                            Achieve Debt Freedom   Retiring soon or want a debt free lifestyle? Reducing your loan term can get you there sooner.                      Payoff My Loan Faster                            Lower Your Payment   Need some extra space in your monthly budget? Changing your loan term could lower your mortgage payment.                      Lower My Payment                            Wanna see more? Check out our rates.                      View Rates
